ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank the Centers for Disease Control of Taiwan for helpful discussions and for outlining the analytical techniques applicable to RT-PCR and dengue virus-specific IgM/IgG capture ELISA detection.

This work was supported by grants 105-G1-1 and 105-G1-2 from the Institute of Preventive Medicine, National Defense Medical Center, Taiwan, Republic of China, and NHRI-108A1-MRCO-0519191 from the National Health Research Institute, Taiwan, Republic of China.
